Physics

I like to consider myself a physicist. It’s what I do as a job right now, it’s what I have a degree in, and it’s what I see myself continuing to pursue for the rest of my life. Here, then, I’ll detail the various physics projects I’ve worked on, any physics-related notes or documents that I make, and really anything else physics-related that I want to share. Cheers.
